name: OAuth2 Scopes

properties.name: activities.read
properties.value: allows your app to fetch data from a user's "Now Playing/Recently Played" list - requires Discord approval

properties.name: activities.write
properties.value: allows your app to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval (NOT REQUIRED FOR GAMESDK ACTIVITY MANAGER)

properties.name: applications.builds.read
properties.value: allows your app to read build data for a user's applications

properties.name: applications.builds.upload
properties.value: allows your app to upload/update builds for a user's applications - requires Discord approval

properties.name: applications.commands
properties.value: allows your app to use commands in a guild

properties.name: applications.commands.update
properties.value: allows your app to update its commands via this bearer token - client credentials grant only

properties.name: applications.entitlements
properties.value: allows your app to read entitlements for a user's applications

properties.name: applications.store.update
properties.value: allows your app to read and update store data (SKUs, store listings, achievements, etc.) for a user's applications

properties.name: bot
properties.value: for oauth2 bots, this puts the bot in the user's selected guild by default

properties.name: connections
properties.value: allows /users/@me/connections to return linked third-party accounts

properties.name: gdm.join
properties.value: allows your app to join users to a group dm

properties.name: guilds
properties.value: allows /users/@me/guilds to return basic information about all of a user's guilds

properties.name: guilds.join
properties.value: allows /guilds/{guild.id}/members/{user.id} to be used for joining users to a guild

properties.name: guilds.members.read
properties.value: allows /users/@me/guilds/{guild.id}/member to return a user's member information in a guild

properties.name: messages.read
properties.value: for local rpc server api access, this allows you to read messages from all client channels (otherwise restricted to channels/guilds your app creates)

properties.name: relationships.read
properties.value: allows your app to know a user's friends and implicit relationships - requires Discord approval

properties.name: rpc
properties.value: for local rpc server access, this allows you to control a user's local Discord client - requires Discord approval

properties.name: rpc.activities.write
properties.value: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's activity - requires Discord approval

properties.name: rpc.notifications.read
properties.value: for local rpc server access, this allows you to receive notifications pushed out to the user - requires Discord approval

properties.name: rpc.voice.read
properties.value: for local rpc server access, this allows you to read a user's voice settings and listen for voice events - requires Discord approval

properties.name: rpc.voice.write
properties.value: for local rpc server access, this allows you to update a user's voice settings - requires Discord approval

properties.name: webhook.incoming
properties.value: this generates a webhook that is returned in the oauth token response for authorization code grants

description: The authorization code grant is what most developers will recognize as "standard OAuth2" and involves retrieving an access code and exchanging it for a user's access token. It allows the authorization server to act as an intermediary between the client and the resource owner, so the resource owner's credentials are never shared directly with the client.

properties.value: true or false—disallows the user from changing the guild dropdown

name: Gateway Close Event Codes

properties.name: Unknown error
properties.description: We're not sure what went wrong. Try reconnecting

properties.name: Unknown opcode
properties.description: You sent an invalid Gateway opcode or an invalid payload for an opcode. Don't do that!

properties.name: Decode error
properties.description: You sent an invalid payload to us. Don't do that!

properties.name: Not authenticated
properties.description: You sent us a payload prior to identifying.

properties.name: Authentication failed
properties.description: The account token sent with your identify payload is incorrect.

properties.name: Already authenticated
properties.description: You sent more than one identify payload. Don't do that!

properties.name: Invalid seq
properties.description: The sequence sent when resuming the session was invalid. Reconnect and start a new session.

properties.name: Rate limited
properties.description: Woah nelly! You're sending payloads to us too quickly. Slow it down! You will be disconnected on receiving this.

properties.name: Session timed out
properties.description: Your session timed out. Reconnect and start a new one.

properties.name: Invalid shard
properties.description: You sent us an invalid shard when identifying.

properties.name: Sharding required
properties.description: The session would have handled too many guilds - you are required to shard your connection in order to connect.

properties.name: Invalid API version
properties.description: You sent an invalid version for the gateway.

properties.name: Invalid intent
properties.description: You sent an invalid intent for a Gateway Intent. You may have incorrectly calculated the bitwise value.

properties.name: Disallowed intent
properties.description: You sent a disallowed intent for a Gateway Intent. You may have tried to specify an intent that you have not enabled or are not approved for.

description: Our voice gateways have their own set of opcodes and close codes.

name: Voice Close Event Codes

properties.name: Unknown opcode
properties.description: You sent an invalid opcode.

properties.name: Failed to decode payload
properties.description: You sent a invalid payload in your identifying to the Gateway.

properties.name: Not authenticated
properties.description: You sent a payload before identifying with the Gateway.

properties.name: Authentication failed
properties.description: The token you sent in your identify payload is incorrect.

properties.name: Already authenticated
properties.description: You sent more than one identify payload. Stahp.

properties.name: Session no longer valid
properties.description: Your session is no longer valid.

properties.name: Session timeout
properties.description: Your session has timed out.

properties.name: Server not found
properties.description: We can't find the server you're trying to connect to.

properties.name: Unknown protocol
properties.description: We didn't recognize the protocol you sent.

properties.name: Disconnected
properties.description: Channel was deleted, you were kicked, voice server changed, or the main gateway session was dropped. Should not reconnect.

properties.name: Voice server crashed
properties.description: The server crashed. Our bad! Try resuming.

properties.name: Unknown encryption mode
properties.description: We didn't recognize your encryption.

description: Our API will return semantically valid HTTP response codes based on the success of your request. The following table can be used as a reference for response codes it will return.

name: HTTP Response Codes

properties.name: The request completed successfully but returned no content.
The request was improperly formatted, or the server couldn't understand it.
The Authorization header was missing or invalid.
The Authorization token you passed did not have permission to the resource.
The resource at the location specified doesn't exist.
The HTTP method used is not valid for the location specified.
You are being rate limited, see Rate Limits.
There was not a gateway available to process your request. Wait a bit and retry.
The server had an error processing your request.

description: Along with the HTTP error code, our API can also return more detailed error codes through a code key in the JSON error response. The response will also contain a message key containing a more friendly error string. Some of these errors may include additional details in the form of Error Messages provided by an errors object.

properties.name: Unknown error
properties.description: An unknown error occurred.

properties.name: Invalid payload
properties.description: You sent an invalid payload.

properties.name: Invalid command
properties.description: Invalid command name specified.

properties.name: Invalid guild
properties.description: Invalid guild ID specified.

properties.name: Invalid event
properties.description: Invalid event name specified.

properties.name: Invalid channel
properties.description: Invalid channel ID specified.

properties.name: Invalid permissions
properties.description: You lack permissions to access the given resource.

properties.name: Invalid client ID
properties.description: An invalid OAuth2 application ID was used to authorize or authenticate with.

properties.name: Invalid origin
properties.description: An invalid OAuth2 application origin was used to authorize or authenticate with.

properties.name: Invalid token
properties.description: An invalid OAuth2 token was used to authorize or authenticate with.

properties.name: Invalid user
properties.description: The specified user ID was invalid.

properties.name: OAuth2 error
properties.description: A standard OAuth2 error occurred; check the data object for the OAuth2 error details.

properties.name: Select channel timed out
properties.description: An asynchronous SELECT_TEXT_CHANNEL/SELECT_VOICE_CHANNEL command timed out.

properties.name: GET_GUILD timed out
properties.description: An asynchronous GET_GUILD command timed out.

properties.name: Select voice force required
properties.description: You tried to join a user to a voice channel but the user was already in one.

properties.name: Capture shortcut already listening
properties.description: You tried to capture more than one shortcut key at once.

properties.name: Invalid client ID
properties.description: You connected to the RPC server with an invalid client ID.

properties.name: Invalid origin
properties.description: You connected to the RPC server with an invalid origin.

properties.name: Rate limited
properties.description: You are being rate limited.

properties.name: Token revoked
properties.description: The OAuth2 token associated with a connection was revoked, get a new one!

properties.name: Invalid version
properties.description: The RPC Server version specified in the connection string was not valid.

properties.name: Invalid encoding
properties.description: The encoding specified in the connection string was not valid.

name: Bitwise Permission Flags

properties.name: CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE
properties.description: Allows creation of instant invites

properties.name: KICK_MEMBERS
properties.description: Allows kicking members

properties.name: BAN_MEMBERS
properties.description: Allows banning members

properties.name: ADMINISTRATOR
properties.description: Allows all permissions and bypasses channel permission overwrites

properties.name: MANAGE_CHANNELS
properties.description: Allows management and editing of channels

properties.name: MANAGE_GUILD
properties.description: Allows management and editing of the guild

properties.name: ADD_REACTIONS
properties.description: Allows for the addition of reactions to messages

properties.name: VIEW_AUDIT_LOG
properties.description: Allows for viewing of audit logs

properties.name: PRIORITY_SPEAKER
properties.description: Allows for using priority speaker in a voice channel

properties.name: STREAM
properties.description: Allows the user to go live

properties.name: VIEW_CHANNEL
properties.description: Allows guild members to view a channel, which includes reading messages in text channels

properties.name: SEND_MESSAGES
properties.description: Allows for sending messages in a channel (does not allow sending messages in threads)

properties.name: SEND_TTS_MESSAGES
properties.description: Allows for sending of /tts messages

properties.name: MANAGE_MESSAGES
properties.description: Allows for deletion of other users messages

properties.name: EMBED_LINKS
properties.description: Links sent by users with this permission will be auto-embedded

properties.name: ATTACH_FILES
properties.description: Allows for uploading images and files

properties.name: READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY
properties.description: Allows for reading of message history

properties.name: MENTION_EVERYONE
properties.description: Allows for using the @everyone tag to notify all users in a channel, and the @here tag to notify all online users in a channel

properties.name: USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS
properties.description: Allows the usage of custom emojis from other servers

properties.name: VIEW_GUILD_INSIGHTS
properties.description: Allows for viewing guild insights

properties.name: CONNECT
properties.description: Allows for joining of a voice channel

properties.name: SPEAK
properties.description: Allows for speaking in a voice channel

properties.name: MUTE_MEMBERS
properties.description: Allows for muting members in a voice channel

properties.name: DEAFEN_MEMBERS
properties.description: Allows for deafening of members in a voice channel

properties.name: MOVE_MEMBERS
properties.description: Allows for moving of members between voice channels

properties.name: USE_VAD
properties.description: Allows for using voice-activity-detection in a voice channel

properties.name: CHANGE_NICKNAME
properties.description: Allows for modification of own nickname

properties.name: MANAGE_NICKNAMES
properties.description: Allows for modification of other users nicknames

properties.name: MANAGE_ROLES
properties.description: Allows management and editing of roles

properties.name: MANAGE_WEBHOOKS
properties.description: Allows management and editing of webhooks

properties.name: MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS
properties.description: Allows management and editing of emojis and stickers

properties.name: USE_APPLICATION_COMMANDS
properties.description: Allows members to use application commands, including slash commands and context menu commands.

properties.name: REQUEST_TO_SPEAK
properties.description: Allows for requesting to speak in stage channels. (This permission is under active development and may be changed or removed.)

properties.name: MANAGE_EVENTS
properties.description: Allows for creating, editing, and deleting scheduled events

properties.name: MANAGE_THREADS
properties.description: Allows for deleting and archiving threads, and viewing all private threads

properties.name: CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS
properties.description: Allows for creating public and announcement threads

properties.name: CREATE_PRIVATE_THREADS
properties.description: Allows for creating private threads

properties.name: USE_EXTERNAL_STICKERS
properties.description: Allows the usage of custom stickers from other servers

properties.name: SEND_MESSAGES_IN_THREADS
properties.description: Allows for sending messages in threads

properties.name: START_EMBEDDED_ACTIVITIES
properties.description: Allows for launching activities (applications with the EMBEDDED flag) in a voice channel

properties.name: MODERATE_MEMBERS
properties.description: Allows for timing out users to prevent them from sending or reacting to messages in chat and threads, and from speaking in voice and stage channels

description: Roles represent a set of permissions attached to a group of users. Roles have unique names, colors, and can be "pinned" to the side bar, causing their members to be listed separately. Roles are unique per guild, and can have separate permission profiles for the global context (guild) and channel context. The @everyone role has the same ID as the guild it belongs to.

name: RPC Versions
description: For applications/games not approved, we limit you to creating 10 guilds and 10 channels. This limit is raised to virtually unlimited after approval.

name: RPC Commands

properties.name: AUTHORIZE
properties.value: used to authorize a new client with your app

properties.name: AUTHENTICATE
properties.value: used to authenticate an existing client with your app

properties.name: GET_GUILD
properties.value: used to retrieve guild information from the client

properties.name: GET_GUILDS
properties.value: used to retrieve a list of guilds from the client

properties.name: GET_CHANNEL
properties.value: used to retrieve channel information from the client

properties.name: GET_CHANNELS
properties.value: used to retrieve a list of channels for a guild from the client

properties.name: SUBSCRIBE
properties.value: used to subscribe to an RPC event

properties.name: UNSUBSCRIBE
properties.value: used to unsubscribe from an RPC event

properties.name: SET_USER_VOICE_SETTINGS
properties.value: used to change voice settings of users in voice channels

properties.name: SELECT_VOICE_CHANNEL
properties.value: used to join or leave a voice channel, group dm, or dm

properties.name: GET_SELECTED_VOICE_CHANNEL
properties.value: used to get the current voice channel the client is in

properties.name: SELECT_TEXT_CHANNEL
properties.value: used to join or leave a text channel, group dm, or dm

properties.name: GET_VOICE_SETTINGS
properties.value: used to retrieve the client's voice settings

properties.name: SET_VOICE_SETTINGS
properties.value: used to set the client's voice settings

properties.name: SET_CERTIFIED_DEVICES
properties.value: used to send info about certified hardware devices

properties.name: SET_ACTIVITY
properties.value: used to update a user's Rich Presence

properties.name: SEND_ACTIVITY_JOIN_INVITE
properties.value: used to consent to a Rich Presence Ask to Join request

properties.name: CLOSE_ACTIVITY_REQUEST
properties.value: used to reject a Rich Presence Ask to Join request

description: Events are payloads sent over the socket to a client that correspond to events in Discord.

name: RPC Events

properties.name: READY
properties.value: non-subscription event sent immediately after connecting, contains server information

properties.name: ERROR
properties.value: non-subscription event sent when there is an error, including command responses

properties.name: GUILD_STATUS
properties.value: sent when a subscribed server's state changes

properties.name: GUILD_CREATE
properties.value: sent when a guild is created/joined on the client

properties.name: CHANNEL_CREATE
properties.value: sent when a channel is created/joined on the client

properties.name: VOICE_CHANNEL_SELECT
properties.value: sent when the client joins a voice channel

properties.name: VOICE_STATE_CREATE
properties.value: sent when a user joins a subscribed voice channel

properties.name: VOICE_STATE_UPDATE
properties.value: sent when a user's voice state changes in a subscribed voice channel (mute, volume, etc.)

properties.name: VOICE_STATE_DELETE
properties.value: sent when a user parts a subscribed voice channel

properties.name: VOICE_SETTINGS_UPDATE
properties.value: sent when the client's voice settings update

properties.name: VOICE_CONNECTION_STATUS
properties.value: sent when the client's voice connection status changes

properties.name: SPEAKING_START
properties.value: sent when a user in a subscribed voice channel speaks

properties.name: SPEAKING_STOP
properties.value: sent when a user in a subscribed voice channel stops speaking

properties.name: MESSAGE_CREATE
properties.value: sent when a message is created in a subscribed text channel

properties.name: MESSAGE_UPDATE
properties.value: sent when a message is updated in a subscribed text channel

properties.name: MESSAGE_DELETE
properties.value: sent when a message is deleted in a subscribed text channel

properties.name: NOTIFICATION_CREATE
properties.value: sent when the client receives a notification (mention or new message in eligible channels)

properties.name: ACTIVITY_JOIN
properties.value: sent when the user clicks a Rich Presence join invite in chat to join a game

properties.name: ACTIVITY_SPECTATE
properties.value: sent when the user clicks a Rich Presence spectate invite in chat to spectate a game

properties.name: ACTIVITY_JOIN_REQUEST
properties.value: sent when the user receives a Rich Presence Ask to Join request

description: We also have an RPC token system to bypass the user authorization modal. This is usable by approved games as well as by users on a game's list of testers, and also disallows use of the messages.read scope. If you have been granted access, you can send a POST request to https://discord.com/api/oauth2/token/rpc with your application's client_id and client_secret in the body (sent as a url-encoded body, not JSON). You can then pass the returned rpc_token value to the rpc_token field in your RPC authorize request (documented below).

name: Gateway Versions

properties.name: default
properties.description: v=1 or omit

description: The first step in connecting to a voice server (and in turn, a guild's voice channel) is formulating a request that can be sent to the Gateway, which will return information about the voice server we will connect to. Because Discord's voice platform is widely distributed, users should never cache or save the results of this call. To inform the gateway of our intent to establish voice connectivity, we first send an Opcode 4 Gateway Voice State Update:

name: Encryption Modes

properties.name: xsalsa20_poly1305
properties.description: The nonce bytes are the RTP header

properties.name: xsalsa20_poly1305_suffix
properties.description: The nonce bytes are 24 bytes appended to the payload of the RTP packet

properties.name: xsalsa20_poly1305_lite
properties.description: The nonce bytes are 4 bytes appended to the payload of the RTP packet

description: Finally, the voice server will respond with a Opcode 4 Session Description that includes the mode and secret_key, a 32 byte array used for encrypting and sending voice data:
